option.name: notice
option.value:
This game is open source.
For the source code, visit https://github.com/ochadenas/cpudefense.
The portraits of the Information Age Heroes are derived from works of the public domain.
Original photos: Jacob Appelbaum (CC BY-SA 2.5) Rama (CC BY-SA 2.0 fr) Shervinafshar (CC BY-SA 3.0) Tony Bove (CC BY 3.0) Wolfgang Hunscher (CC BY-SA 3.0)
All other artwork: Oliver Chadenas (CC BY-SA 3.0)
